abstract: In the last days of December, as the financial strength ratings of the old bond insurance companies were under pressure and the insurers were being forced to put up additional capital, Warren E. Buffett announced the start of his new municipal bond insurer, the Berkshire Hathaway Assurance Corporation.
lead_paragraph: In the last days of December, as the financial strength ratings of the old bond insurance companies were under pressure and the insurers were being forced to put up additional capital, Warren E. Buffett announced the start of his new municipal bond insurer, the Berkshire Hathaway Assurance Corporation.

headline.main: A Regulator Who Cut Through Red Tape for Buffett
